title: Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad - Single Player
notes: Downloading Multiplayer will test and report back.

title: Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad - Single Player
notes: The game works "out of the box", unfortunately it works very poorly (it looks like it's limited by a single rendering thread which is used at a 100%). There is quite a bit of stuttering which can make is unplayable for some.

title: Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad - Single Player
notes: Works but poor performance makes it unplayable

title: Red Orchestra 2: Heroes of Stalingrad - Single Player
notes:
If you minimalize, maximalize window you can have black screen.
New Nvidia driver from repository "deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/graphics-drivers/ppa/ubuntu xenial main"
Very good liquidity game.
